API docs by Redocly

OpsChain API (v1)

Download OpenAPI specification:

LimePoint Pty Ltd: opschain@limepoint.com URL: https://opschain.io

Introduction

OpsChain is an orchestration and change automation platform based in GitOps principles with a core objective to Unify Change. Connect, automate, and orchestrate people, processes, and tools across your on-premise and cloud platforms.

Projects

Endpoints to interact with projects.

Notes:

  • The show and list response payloads include links to the project's assets, changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints. These endpoints act like the assets, changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints respectively.
  • The list, create, show, update and archive asset endpoints are available via the /<path/to/asset/owner>/assets path. The example endpoints in this section reflect assets owned by a project.

List projects

Lists all projects (including archived projects).

Each project in the response includes a link to:

  • the project's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this project. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the project's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this project. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the project's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this project. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the project's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this project. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the project's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this project's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the project's workflows endpoint for viewing this project's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[code_eq]=opc

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=projects.csv

Download the projects in CSV format with the specified file name. The projects will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "050a26ce-e75a-4cb3-b7e5-7826dc4600ee",
      • "type": "project",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "opc",
        • "name": "OpsChain",
        • "description": "OpsChain project",
        • "archived": false,
        • "created_by": "jeramy",
        • "project_type": "Enterprise"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "e10de5d0-bd30-4b25-97a7-ff09b8debe23",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/e10de5d0-bd30-4b25-97a7-ff09b8debe23"
            }
          },
        • "parents": {
          • "data": [ ]
          },
        • "settings": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "541873e8-c3d6-4318-ab0b-16a3839c09ee",
            • "type": "settings"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/settings/541873e8-c3d6-4318-ab0b-16a3839c09ee"
            }
          },
        • "children": {
          • "data": [ ]
          },
        • "bookmarks": {
          • "data": [ ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/opc/bookmarks",
        • "changes": "/api/projects/opc/changes",
        • "scheduled_activities": "/api/projects/opc/scheduled_activities",
        • "git_remotes": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes",
        • "workflows": "/api/projects/opc/workflows",
        • "workflow_runs": "/api/projects/opc/workflow_runs",
        • "templates": "/api/projects/opc/templates",
        • "environments": "/api/projects/opc/environments",
        • "assets": "/api/projects/opc/assets"
        },
      • "meta": {
        • "can_have_changes": true,
        • "can_have_children": true,
        • "can_have_properties": true,
        • "can_have_settings": true,
        • "can_have_templates": true,
        • "requires_template": false,
        • "child_node_types": [
          • "environment",
          • "asset"
          ],
        • "can_have_workflows": true,
        • "authorisations": {
          • "properties": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "settings": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "scheduled_activities": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "git_remotes": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "templates": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "workflows": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "changes": {
            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true
            },
          • "workflow_runs": {
            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true
            },
          • "environments": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "assets": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "self": {
            • "update": true
            }
          }
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Create project

Creates a project.

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "opc",
      • "name": "OpsChain",
      • "description": "OpsChain project",
      • "project_type": "Enterprise"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "e3affb48-464b-4cd6-a306-fc843918637c",
    • "type": "project",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "gbuqu",
      • "name": "consequuntur397",
      • "description": "Voluptates delectus iure qui.",
      • "archived": false,
      • "created_by": "damion",
      • "project_type": "Standard"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "72392d78-a9ef-408e-bc21-1fd0d665e8cc",
          • "type": "properties"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/properties/72392d78-a9ef-408e-bc21-1fd0d665e8cc"
          }
        },
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "settings": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "629062ee-d2c1-4f3c-80c6-884a37856af4",
          • "type": "settings"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/settings/629062ee-d2c1-4f3c-80c6-884a37856af4"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "bookmarks": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/gbuqu",
      • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/gbuqu/bookmarks",
      • "git_remotes": "/api/projects/gbuqu/git_remotes",
      • "environments": "/api/projects/gbuqu/environments"
      },
    • "meta": {
      • "can_have_changes": false,
      • "can_have_children": true,
      • "can_have_properties": true,
      • "can_have_settings": true,
      • "can_have_templates": false,
      • "requires_template": false,
      • "child_node_types": [
        • "environment"
        ],
      • "can_have_workflows": false,
      • "authorisations": {
        • "properties": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "settings": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "git_remotes": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "changes": {
          • "read": true,
          • "execute": false
          },
        • "environments": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "self": {
          • "update": true
          }
        }
      }
    }
}

Show project

Shows a project, including any direct children.

The response includes a link to:

  • the project's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this project. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the project's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this project. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the project's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this project. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the project's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this project. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the project's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this project's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the project's workflows endpoint for viewing this project's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "b6f60af4-7399-4b92-acb7-b55538c0a3ac",
    • "type": "project",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "opc",
      • "name": "OpsChain",

          • "update": true
          }
        }
      }
    },
  • "included": [ ]
}

Update project

Updates a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Modified",
      • "description": "The updated project",
      • "archived": false
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404

Archive project

Archives a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Environments

Endpoints to interact with environments.

Notes:

  • The show and list response payloads include links to the environment's assets, changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints. These endpoints act like the assets, changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints respectively.
  • The list, create, show, update and archive asset endpoints are available via the /<path/to/asset/owner>/assets path. The example endpoints in this section reflect assets owned by a project.

List environments

Lists all project environments (including archived environments).

Each environment in the response includes a link to:

  • the environment's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this environment. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the environment's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this environment. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the environment's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this environment. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the environment's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this environment. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the environment's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this environment's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the environment's workflows endpoint for viewing this environment's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[name_eq]=Test

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=environments.csv

Download the project environments in CSV format with the specified file name. The environments will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/environments

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "a1998ef5-396c-4696-ab98-5941bee7909c",
      • "type": "environment",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "dev",
        • "name": "Development",
        • "description": "OpsChain development environment",
        • "archived": false,
        • "created_by": "avelina_jaskolski"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "7feefa1c-810f-416c-a01c-a9021412b96e",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/7feefa1c-810f-416c-a01c-a9021412b96e"
            }
          },
        • "parents": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "2f5bd832-945b-4fe9-a90a-a66403948a47",
              • "type": "project"
              }
            ]
          },
        • "settings": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "2f71bcf1-08db-4b13-820a-224543963404",
            • "type": "settings"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/settings/2f71bcf1-08db-4b13-820a-224543963404"
            }
          },
        • "project": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "2f5bd832-945b-4fe9-a90a-a66403948a47",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/projects/opc"
            }
          },
        • "children": {
          • "data": [ ]
          },
        • "bookmarks": {
          • "data": [ ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev",
        • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/bookmarks",
        • "changes": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/changes",
        • "scheduled_activities": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/scheduled_activities",
        • "parent": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "assets": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/assets"
        },
      • "meta": {
        • "can_have_changes": true,
        • "can_have_children": true,
        • "can_have_properties": true,
        • "can_have_settings": true,
        • "can_have_templates": false,
        • "requires_template": false,
        • "child_node_types": [
          • "asset"
          ],
        • "can_have_workflows": false,
        • "authorisations": {
          • "properties": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "settings": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "scheduled_activities": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "changes": {
            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true
            },
          • "assets": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "self": {
            • "update": true
            }
          }
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Create environment

Creates an environment.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/environments

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "dev",
      • "name": "Development",
      • "description": "OpsChain development environment"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "df7ce04e-fc11-4792-9213-b161f2ed91db",
    • "type": "environment",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "fs0cu",
      • "name": "laboriosam355",
      • "description": "Illum deserunt odit maiores.",
      • "archived": false,
      • "created_by": "cathleen"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "f404604a-e010-4a24-94be-85d5ab273a34",
          • "type": "properties"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/properties/f404604a-e010-4a24-94be-85d5ab273a34"
          }
        },
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "e455be81-e00f-40f3-a78d-b79ddbef6ffc",

          ]

          • "id": "df5283a2-fc6a-4388-a149-1b9ca9e7c512",

          }
        },

          • "related": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "bookmarks": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/environments/fs0cu",
      • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/opc/environments/fs0cu/bookmarks",

      • "scheduled_activities": "/api/projects/opc/environments/fs0cu/scheduled_activities",

Show environment

Shows an environment.

The response includes a link to:

  • the environment's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this environment. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the environment's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this environment. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the environment's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this environment. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the environment's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this environment. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the environment's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this environment's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the environment's workflows endpoint for viewing this environment's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

environment_code
required
string
Example: dev

environment code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/environments/{environment_code}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "2ade8a1c-17b2-47b3-9474-f9007547a7d7",
    • "type": "environment",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "dev",
      • "name": "Development",
      • "description": "OpsChain development environment",

Update environment

Updates an environment.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

environment_code
required
string
Example: dev

environment code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/environments/{environment_code}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Modified",
      • "description": "The updated environment",
      • "archived": false
      }
    }
}

  • 400
  • 404

Archives an environment.

path Parameters

required
string
Example: opc

project code

environment_code
required
string
Example: dev

environment code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/environments/{environment_code}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Assets

Endpoints to interact with assets.

Notes:

  • The show and list response payloads include links to the asset's changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints. These endpoints act like the changes, scheduled activity, bookmarks and MintModels endpoints respectively.
  • The list, create, show, update and archive asset endpoints are available via the /<path/to/asset/owner>/assets path. The example endpoints in this section reflect assets owned by a project.

List generate actions request log lines

List the log lines generated while building an image and querying the actions available for this asset / template version combination.

Note: See the list filtered log lines API docs for filtering options.

path Parameters
generate_actions_request_id
required
string
Example: 6ba918b4-8ef4-4bfa-bfd6-4b02f8b6d46d
query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=change.log

Download the log lines with the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/generate_actions_request_log_lines?generate_actions_request_id={generate_actions_request_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "92a5f06b-10c9-4464-9e45-3bcec702ccb8",
      • "type": "generate_actions_request_log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "message": "Vitae ea praesentium rerum.",
        • "template_version_history_id": "356473a6-968e-4eaa-9d5a-393bbc86ac81",
        • "generate_actions_request_id": "13671deb-b4ff-48de-908b-1867873921a2",
        • "logged_at": "2025-09-10T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

Create generate actions request

Create a request to refresh the actions list for an asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/generate_actions_requests

Response samples

  • 201
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "bf88d9e2-6cfb-49cf-a7e6-b6648eba3794",
    • "type": "generate_actions_request",
    • "attributes": {
      • "actions": [ ],
      • "request_number": 1,
      • "status_code": "initializing",
      • "error_message": null,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:43.818825Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:43.818825Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "template_version_history": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "3ccb4701-1e59-4e0a-b662-71e55bee369a",
          • "type": "template_version_history"
          }
        },
      • "owner": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "ff0356f7-f4d5-43de-b3fa-6742f2fac678",
          • "type": "asset"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "template_version": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/generate_actions_requests/bf88d9e2-6cfb-49cf-a7e6-b6648eba3794",
      • "asset": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
      • "log_lines": "/api/generate_actions_request_log_lines?generate_actions_request_id=bf88d9e2-6cfb-49cf-a7e6-b6648eba3794"
      }
    }
}

List generate actions requests

Lists all generate actions requests made for the asset's current template version.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/generate_actions_requests

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "a0a06626-3d5a-482c-bba7-df7d499164f6",
      • "type": "generate_actions_request",
      • "attributes": {
        • "actions": [
          • {
            • "name": "compress",
            • "children": [ ],

            • "stage_step": false,
            • "description": "If we back up the protocol, we can get to the COM card through the back-end THX transmitter!",
            • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
            },
          • {
            • "name": "override",
            • "children": [ ],

      }

string

asset_code
required

required

Cancel generate actions request

Cancels the generate actions request.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

generate_actions_request_id
required
string
Example: 6ba918b4-8ef4-4bfa-bfd6-4b02f8b6d46d

generate actions request id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/generate_actions_requests/{generate_actions_request_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

List assets

Lists all assets (including archived assets) that belong to the project.

Each asset in the response includes a link to:

  • the asset's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this asset. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the asset's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this asset. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the asset's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this asset. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the asset's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this asset. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the asset's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this asset's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the asset's workflows endpoint for viewing this asset's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[name_eq]=Test

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=assets.csv

Download the project assets in CSV format with the specified file name. The assets will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "0507ad01-b62c-4fe3-b0d8-92f15f0ce860",
      • "type": "asset",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "prj_soa",
        • "name": "Project asset",
        • "description": "Project asset description",
        • "archived": false,
        • "created_by": "george_schiller",
        • "actions": [
          • {
            • "name": "compress",
            • "children": [ ],
            • "full_path": "compress",
            • "stage_step": false,
            • "description": "Use the mobile COM protocol, then you can index the online pixel!",
            • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
            },
          • {
            • "name": "provision",
            • "description": "Provision resource on existing hardware"
            },
          • {
            • "name": "reboot",
            • "children": [ ],
            • "full_path": "reboot",
            • "stage_step": false,
            • "description": "If we navigate the alarm, we can get to the SQL alarm through the multi-byte HDD system!",
            • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
            }
          ],
        • "mintmodel_valid": true,
        • "erb_file_content": null,
        • "generating_actions": false
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "e1033e4a-38d2-4850-85f1-5c82b8f78cdf",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/e1033e4a-38d2-4850-85f1-5c82b8f78cdf"
            }
          },
        • "parents": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "7015c579-d443-4ff3-9a4f-7dd0ce5d04f1",
              • "type": "project"
              }
            ]
          },
        • "settings": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "530a5054-531c-4ffa-9729-312ddd07ce24",
            • "type": "settings"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/settings/530a5054-531c-4ffa-9729-312ddd07ce24"
            }
          },
        • "project": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "7015c579-d443-4ff3-9a4f-7dd0ce5d04f1",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/projects/opc"
            }
          },
        • "template_version": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "efd1ab44-b0b7-491a-824f-b27b0a9b004e",
            • "type": "template_version"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2"
            }
          },
        • "bookmarks": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "b10048f5-43da-44cb-b355-18a9096edaef",
              • "type": "bookmark"
              }
            ]
          },
        • "template": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "ed93958d-4806-4667-84b0-c1696118ff15",
            • "type": "template"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa"
            }
          },
        • "current_generate_actions_request": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "e304b6d8-656d-4c91-9ef5-f09a9ace3bd0",
            • "type": "generate_actions_request"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/generate_actions_requests/e304b6d8-656d-4c91-9ef5-f09a9ace3bd0"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
        • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/bookmarks",
        • "changes": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/changes",
        • "scheduled_activities": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/scheduled_activities",
        • "converged_properties": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/converged_properties",
        • "mintmodels": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels",
        • "mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history",
        • "parent": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "version_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/version_history"
        },
      • "meta": {
        • "can_have_changes": true,
        • "can_have_children": false,
        • "can_have_properties": true,
        • "can_have_settings": true,
        • "can_have_templates": false,
        • "requires_template": true,
        • "child_node_types": [ ],
        • "can_have_workflows": false,
        • "authorisations": {
          • "properties": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "settings": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "scheduled_activities": {
            • "read": true,
            • "update": true
            },
          • "changes": {
            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true
            },
          • "self": {
            • "update": true
            }
          }
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Create asset

Creates an asset belonging to the project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "prj_soa",
      • "name": "Project asset",
      • "description": "Project asset description",
      • "template_name": "Oracle SOA template",
      • "template_version": "2023_Q4_2"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "77c6bb4a-4abe-44ae-96f6-f7e3a620d2e4",
    • "type": "asset",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "ldsqt",
      • "name": "qui327",
      • "description": "Delectus aliquid velit eos.",

          }

      • "erb_file_content": null,
      • "generating_actions": true
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {

          • "type": "properties"
          },

          }
        }
      },

      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/ldsqt",
      • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/opc/assets/ldsqt/bookmarks",

      • "scheduled_activities": "/api/projects/opc/assets/ldsqt/scheduled_activities",
      • "converged_properties": "/api/projects/opc/assets/ldsqt/converged_properties",
      • "mintmodels": "/api/projects/opc/assets/ldsqt/mintmodels",
      • "mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/ldsqt/mintmodel_history",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "version_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/ldsqt/version_history"
      },
    • "meta": {
      • "can_have_changes": true,
      • "can_have_children": false,
      • "can_have_properties": true,
      • "can_have_settings": true,
      • "can_have_templates": false,
      • "requires_template": true,
      • "child_node_types": [ ],
      • "can_have_workflows": false,
      • "authorisations": {
        • "properties": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "settings": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "scheduled_activities": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "changes": {
          • "read": true,
          • "execute": true
          },
        • "self": {
          • "update": true
          }
        }
      }
    }
}

Show asset

Shows an asset belonging to a project.

The response includes a link to:

  • the asset's changes endpoint for managing changes belonging to this asset. It acts like the changes endpoint.
  • the asset's scheduled_activities endpoint for managing scheduled activities belonging to this asset. It acts like a scheduled activities endpoint.
  • the asset's bookmarks endpoint for managing the bookmarks belonging to this asset. It acts like a bookmarks endpoint.
  • the asset's mintmodels endpoint for managing the MintModels belonging to this asset. It acts like a MintModels endpoint.
  • the asset's mintmodel_history endpoint for viewing this asset's MintModel history. It acts like a MintModel history endpoint.
  • the asset's workflows endpoint for viewing this asset's workflows. It acts like a Workflows endpoint. .
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "db95933e-9d92-4a12-9204-d3e0561b9cee",

Update asset

Updates an asset belonging to a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Modified",
      • "description": "The updated asset",
      • "archived": false,
      • "regenerate_actions": true
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "eed3fad0-b277-4625-a40a-9c3bcde77371",
    • "type": "asset",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "prj_soa",
      • "name": "voluptatem337",
      • "description": "Velit maiores aliquid reprehenderit.",
      • "archived": true,
      • "created_by": "dakota",
      • "actions": [
        • {
          • "name": "index",
          • "children": [ ],
          • "full_path": "index",
          • "stage_step": false,
          • "description": "I'll hack the redundant HTTP capacitor, that should port the AI program!",
          • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
          },
        • {
          • "name": "override",
          • "children": [ ],
          • "full_path": "override",
          • "stage_step": false,
          • "description": "Use the virtual FTP program, then you can parse the primary card!",
          • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
          },
        • {
          • "name": "provision",
          • "description": "Provision resource on existing hardware"
          }
        ],
      • "mintmodel_valid": true,
      • "erb_file_content": null,
      • "generating_actions": false
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "083bdd7f-1f21-4f6d-97de-690b3a06d3d1",
          • "type": "properties"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/properties/083bdd7f-1f21-4f6d-97de-690b3a06d3d1"
          }
        },
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "70f6317d-4a8f-4ed6-826c-6aeb09bcbb71",
            • "type": "project"
            }
          ]
        },
      • "settings": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "4c8c881c-7161-4705-9463-a4865e21ab0a",
          • "type": "settings"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/settings/4c8c881c-7161-4705-9463-a4865e21ab0a"
          }
        },
      • "project": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "70f6317d-4a8f-4ed6-826c-6aeb09bcbb71",
          • "type": "project"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        },
      • "template_version": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "e1e4a057-347a-4082-b33e-309f383f4696",
          • "type": "template_version"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2"
          }
        },
      • "bookmarks": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "c3ca72ad-47e9-4693-8cf6-cb096d2ecd4d",
            • "type": "bookmark"
            }
          ]
        },
      • "template": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "60436b2f-1172-4244-a2a7-c368f1385d7f",
          • "type": "template"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa"
          }
        },
      • "current_generate_actions_request": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "6ea80a8d-67e2-42de-8b2f-4fb5a3579fb4",
          • "type": "generate_actions_request"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/generate_actions_requests/6ea80a8d-67e2-42de-8b2f-4fb5a3579fb4"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
      • "bookmarks": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/bookmarks",
      • "changes": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/changes",
      • "scheduled_activities": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/scheduled_activities",
      • "converged_properties": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/converged_properties",
      • "mintmodels": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels",
      • "mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "version_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/version_history"
      },
    • "meta": {
      • "can_have_changes": true,
      • "can_have_children": false,
      • "can_have_properties": true,
      • "can_have_settings": true,
      • "can_have_templates": false,
      • "requires_template": true,
      • "child_node_types": [ ],
      • "can_have_workflows": false,
      • "authorisations": {
        • "properties": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "settings": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "scheduled_activities": {
          • "read": true,
          • "update": true
          },
        • "changes": {
          • "read": true,
          • "execute": true
          },
        • "self": {
          • "update": true
          }
        }
      }
    }
}

Archive asset

Archives an asset belonging to a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Show converged properties

Show the converged properties as they will appear to actions run on this asset. i.e. the endpoint will

  1. merge any template (repository) properties from the asset's template (in the order described in the documentation)
  2. merge any project properties
  3. merge any properties assigned to the project asset

The API response will also include all the individual repository and database properties that were included in the result.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

query Parameters
template_version_id
string
Example: template_version_id=408bb189-8cdb-4f64-ad8e-9307933aae04

Specify the id of a template versions previously assigned to the asset to source the repository properties from.

filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[action_eq]=Test

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/converged_properties

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "prj_soa",
    • "type": "converged_properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "repo": "project_properties",
        • "common": "property",
        • "project": "property",
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        }
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "repository_properties": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "properties.yaml",
            • "type": "repository_properties"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "projects/opc.yaml",
            • "type": "repository_properties"
            }
          ]
        },
      • "properties": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "f81559e7-19f0-4240-bc95-b80b8cdbfaa3",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "3affa310-4950-4e49-9c94-ddde3b4382e1",
            • "type": "properties"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/converged_properties"
      },
    • "meta": {
      • "property_sources": {
        • "by_property": {
          • "repo": "Repository: projects/opc.yaml",
          • "common": "Repository: properties.yaml",
          • "project": "Repository: projects/opc.yaml",
          • "any_key": "Project: OpsChain (opc)",
          • "another_key": "Project: OpsChain (opc)",
          • "nested": {
            • "key": "Project: OpsChain (opc)"
            }
          },
        • "by_source": {
          • "database": {
            • "project": [
              • [
                • "any_key"
                ],
              • [
                • "another_key"
                ],
              • [
                • "nested",
                • "key"
                ]
              ]
            },
          • "repo": {
            • "projects/opc.yaml": [
              • [
                • "repo"
                ],
              • [
                • "project"
                ]
              ],
            • "properties.yaml": [
              • [
                • "common"
                ]
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
  • "included": [
    • {
      • "id": "f81559e7-19f0-4240-bc95-b80b8cdbfaa3",
      • "type": "properties",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "any_key": "with a value",
          • "another_key": "with a different value",
          • "nested": {
            • "key": "nested value"
            }
          },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:54.170189Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "owner": {
          • "links": {
            • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/properties/f81559e7-19f0-4240-bc95-b80b8cdbfaa3",
        • "current_version": "/api/properties/f81559e7-19f0-4240-bc95-b80b8cdbfaa3/versions/1",
        • "versions": "/api/properties/f81559e7-19f0-4240-bc95-b80b8cdbfaa3/versions"
        }
      },
    • {
      • "id": "3affa310-4950-4e49-9c94-ddde3b4382e1",
      • "type": "properties",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": { },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:54.232940Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "owner": {
          • "links": {
            • "owner": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/properties/3affa310-4950-4e49-9c94-ddde3b4382e1",
        • "current_version": "/api/properties/3affa310-4950-4e49-9c94-ddde3b4382e1/versions/1",
        • "versions": "/api/properties/3affa310-4950-4e49-9c94-ddde3b4382e1/versions"
        }
      },
    • {
      • "id": "properties.yaml",
      • "type": "repository_properties",
      • "attributes": {
        • "content": {
          • "repo": "base_properties",
          • "common": "property"
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "repository_path": ".opschain/properties.yaml"
        }
      },
    • {
      • "id": "projects/opc.yaml",
      • "type": "repository_properties",
      • "attributes": {
        • "content": {
          • "repo": "project_properties",
          • "project": "property"
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "repository_path": ".opschain/projects/opc.yaml"
        }
      }
    ]
}

List template version history

Lists the template versions that have been assigned to the asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[name_eq]=Test

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/version_history

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "7eb6a54d-e75e-41ed-a935-0601a6fb9814",
      • "type": "template_version_history",
      • "attributes": {
        • "created_by": "daryl",
        • "active_from": "2025-09-11T00:46:14.056091Z",
        • "active_to": null
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "owner": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "24f72580-4884-4f1e-835e-b58675622a49",
            • "type": "asset"
            }
          },
        • "template_version": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "282e7bbd-4cfd-4401-9c20-959cf88bdd3f",
            • "type": "template_version"
            }
          },
        • "generate_actions_requests": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "2635d124-317c-4441-ad5e-4b7e6e5a8207",
              • "type": "generate_actions_request"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "template_version": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2",
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/version_history/7eb6a54d-e75e-41ed-a935-0601a6fb9814",
        • "asset": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Show template version history

Shows a specific project asset's template version history record.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

id
required
string
Example: d5c3deea-db77-4a47-a8ad-f591cb3b3d22

version history id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/version_history/{id}

Templates

Templates provide the available actions and a base set of repository properties that will be used to configure the asset.

List template versions

Lists all versions of a specific template.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

template_code
required
string
Example: soa

template code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/templates/{template_code}/versions

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "3e7a1f7a-1495-44a8-99d4-797f5656539f",
      • "type": "template_version",
      • "attributes": {
        • "version": "2023_Q4_2",
        • "description": "Added additional configuration options",
        • "state": "ready",
        • "created_by": "loyce.bauch",
        • "archived": false,
        • "has_mintmodel": true,
        • "initialization_error": null,
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:14.529998Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:14.529998Z",
        • "git_rev": "online",
        • "commit_sha": "d21f9dcce3286f1ee260cf25b54fa9d76ae7c922",
        • "git_remote_name": "github"
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2",
        • "template": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Create or update a template version

Create or update a template version.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

template_code
required
string
Example: soa

template code

version
required
string
Example: 2023_Q4_2

template version

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/templates/{template_code}/versions/{version}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "description": "Added additional configuration options",
      • "git_rev": "mobile",
      • "archived": false
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "fa61d816-7ee7-4ad6-9c28-932244186462",
    • "type": "template_version",
    • "attributes": {
      • "version": "2023_Q4_2",
      • "description": "Ratione consequatur blanditiis nulla voluptatem fugiat velit eligendi sapiente fugit iusto aliquam",
      • "state": "initializing",
      • "created_by": "erasmo.cartwright",
      • "archived": false,
      • "has_mintmodel": false,
      • "initialization_error": null,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:14.938510Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:14.938510Z",
      • "git_rev": "auxiliary",
      • "commit_sha": null,
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2",
      • "template": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa"
      }
    }
}

Show template version

Shows a specific template version.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

template_code
required
string
Example: soa

template code

version
required
string
Example: 2023_Q4_2

template version

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/templates/{template_code}/versions/{version}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "54692c6a-a8a7-4b0b-b883-c2e036cdfdd4",
    • "type": "template_version",
    • "attributes": {
      • "version": "2023_Q4_2",
      • "description": "Added additional configuration options",
      • "state": "ready",
      • "created_by": "joi.purdy",
      • "archived": false,
      • "has_mintmodel": true,
      • "initialization_error": null,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:15.614822Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:15.614822Z",
      • "git_rev": "optical",
      • "commit_sha": "caca1cfce2426f123fae877e63f62a3cf0af48fa",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2",
      • "template": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa"
      }
    }
}

Bulk assign assets to template versions

Assign assets to the template version.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

template_code
required
string
Example: soa

template code

version
required
string
Example: 2023_Q4_2

template version

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/templates/{template_code}/versions/{version}/assign_to_assets

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "asset_paths": [
        • "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
        ]
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "13116749-42e8-4790-92fe-066c8cb74817",
    • "type": "template_version",
    • "attributes": {
      • "version": "2023_Q4_2",
      • "description": "Added additional configuration options",
      • "state": "ready",
      • "created_by": "lyla",
      • "archived": false,
      • "has_mintmodel": true,
      • "initialization_error": null,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:15.934466Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:15.934466Z",
      • "git_rev": "online",
      • "commit_sha": "acca1927d833cd24d0bb2c1e1b14c9308c0d51d9",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions/2023_Q4_2",
      • "template": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa"
      }
    }
}

Create template

Create a template.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/templates

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "soa",
      • "name": "Oracle SOA template",
      • "description": "Oracle SOA Suite 12c (12.2.1.4.0)",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "f6562522-22ba-49d2-af1c-ab58fe1d0d90",
    • "type": "template",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "rikdh",
      • "name": "ken_pagac",
      • "description": "Maiores corporis minima qui.",
      • "archived": false,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:17.064231Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:17.064231Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "git_remote": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "1e5fed55-0fd0-44b6-b381-b713d0de5949",
          • "type": "git_remote"
          }
        },
      • "template_versions": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/rikdh",
      • "template_versions": "/api/projects/opc/templates/rikdh/versions",
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc"
      }
    }
}

List templates

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/templates

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "d9840ea3-5525-46b7-aef4-2494cdd97ef4",
      • "type": "template",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "soa",
        • "name": "Oracle SOA template",
        • "description": "Oracle SOA Suite 12c (12.2.1.4.0)",
        • "archived": false,
        • "disabled": false,
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:17.697461Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:17.697461Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "git_remote": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "9f509710-5de7-4310-908b-9cccc5770f03",
            • "type": "git_remote"
            }
          },
        • "template_versions": {
          • "data": [ ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa",
        • "template_versions": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions",
        • "project": "/api/projects/opc"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

string

path Parameters

required
string
Example: opc

required
string
Example: soa

template code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

application/vnd.api+json

  • "data": {

      • "archived": true
      }
    }
}

  • 400
  • 404

  • "data": {
    • "id": "dba7037a-2e88-4698-89fb-8343cf00ad16",

      • "code": "soa",
      • "name": "Oracle SOA template",
      • "description": "Oracle SOA Suite 12c (12.2.1.4.0)",
      • "archived": true,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:18.336814Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:18.376305Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "git_remote": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "80986e62-404e-4166-9d04-a0778a05f137",
          • "type": "git_remote"
          }
        },
      • "template_versions": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },

      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa",

      • "project": "/api/projects/opc"

      • "name": "Oracle SOA template",
      • "description": "Oracle SOA Suite 12c (12.2.1.4.0)",

      • "disabled": false
      }

  • 400
  • 404

      • "description": "updated_description",

      • "disabled": false,

      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:18.867727Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "git_remote": {
        • "data": {

          }

      • "template_versions": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }

      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa",
      • "template_versions": "/api/projects/opc/templates/soa/versions",

Git remotes

Endpoints to interact with git remotes.

Create Git remote

Create a project Git remote.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/git_remotes

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "user": "limepoint",
      • "password": "password",
      • "ssh_key_data": "-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----\n...\n-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----\n"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "4de57122-1746-4273-920b-9f91effedc66",
    • "type": "git_remote",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "archived": false,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:45.374270Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:45.374270Z",
      • "user": null,
      • "password": null,
      • "ssh_key_data": null
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "templates": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "templates": "/api/projects/opc/templates?filter%5Bgit_remote_name_eq%5D=github",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/4de57122-1746-4273-920b-9f91effedc66"
      },
    • "meta": null
    }
}

List Git remotes

Lists all Git remotes for a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/git_remotes

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "999e6752-cebd-4433-a7bd-776d1e392ba2",
      • "type": "git_remote",
      • "attributes": {
        • "name": "github",
        • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
        • "archived": false,
        • "disabled": false,
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:46.031926Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:46.031926Z",
        • "user": "{{hidden}}",
        • "password": "{{hidden}}",
        • "ssh_key_data": "{{hidden}}"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "templates": {
          • "data": [ ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "templates": "/api/projects/opc/templates?filter%5Bgit_remote_name_eq%5D=github",
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/999e6752-cebd-4433-a7bd-776d1e392ba2"
        },
      • "meta": null
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Show Git remote

Shows a project Git remote.

Note: Git remote credentials are obfuscated for security reasons.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

remote_id
required
string
Example: b2138924-af19-426b-a585-95d18c79f75b

remote id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/git_remotes/{remote_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "41bbbd70-8cdc-4b45-bfab-57ff239515f6",
    • "type": "git_remote",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "archived": false,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:46.571344Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:46.571344Z",
      • "user": "{{hidden}}",
      • "password": "{{hidden}}",
      • "ssh_key_data": "{{hidden}}"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "templates": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "templates": "/api/projects/opc/templates?filter%5Bgit_remote_name_eq%5D=github",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/41bbbd70-8cdc-4b45-bfab-57ff239515f6"
      },
    • "meta": null
    }
}

      • "password": "{{hidden}}",

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

id_to_update
required
string
Example: b2138924-af19-426b-a585-95d18c79f75b

remote id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/git_remotes/{id_to_update}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "user": "limepoint",
      • "password": "password",
      • "ssh_key_data": "-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----\n...\n-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----\n"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "43919e4e-d78f-4ba8-9fb4-733e84813cb2",
    • "type": "git_remote",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "archived": false,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:47.338942Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:47.376605Z",
      • "user": "{{hidden}}",
      • "password": "{{hidden}}",
      • "ssh_key_data": "{{hidden}}"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "templates": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "templates": "/api/projects/opc/templates?filter%5Bgit_remote_name_eq%5D=github",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/43919e4e-d78f-4ba8-9fb4-733e84813cb2"
      },
    • "meta": null
    }
}

Delete Git remote

Deletes a project Git remote if it has no changes, otherwise it removes the credentials.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

id_to_delete
required
string
Example: b2138924-af19-426b-a585-95d18c79f75b

remote id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/git_remotes/{id_to_delete}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 204
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "7f3b9457-119f-448f-b72a-1213f7d1a2eb",
    • "type": "git_remote",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "github",
      • "url": "https://github.com/LimePoint/opschain-getting-started",
      • "archived": true,
      • "disabled": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:47.972626Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:48.281520Z",
      • "user": null,
      • "password": null,
      • "ssh_key_data": null
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "templates": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "templates": "/api/projects/opc/templates?filter%5Bgit_remote_name_eq%5D=github",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/7f3b9457-119f-448f-b72a-1213f7d1a2eb"
      },
    • "meta": {
      • "credentials_removed": true,
      • "messages": [
        • "This Git remote cannot be deleted as it is used by a change, its credentials have been removed."
        ]
      }
    }
}

Bookmarks

Endpoints to interact with bookmarks.

Notes:

  • The list, create, show, update and delete bookmark endpoints are available via the /<path/to/bookmark/owner>/bookmarks path. The example endpoints in this section reflect bookmarks owned by a project asset.

Create bookmark

Create a bookmark for a specific project, environment or asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/bookmarks

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "description": "SOA administration console",
      • "url": "https://soa.project_asset.server:7002/admin/console",
      • "created_by": "ethyl.ferry"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "c749a1fe-654b-4b8a-b352-895d0200a2df",
    • "type": "bookmark",
    • "attributes": {
      • "url": "https://pfannerstill-mohr.example/bula_gottlieb",
      • "description": "Laboriosam dolorum deserunt placeat.",
      • "created_by": "nicol.gutkowski",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:34.555554Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:34.555554Z"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/bookmarks/c749a1fe-654b-4b8a-b352-895d0200a2df",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
      }
    }
}

List bookmarks

Lists all bookmarks for a specific project, environment or asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/bookmarks

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "d620a26e-d05e-43c1-a658-586ab326df90",
      • "type": "bookmark",
      • "attributes": {
        • "url": "https://soa.project_asset.server:7002/admin/console",
        • "description": "SOA administration console",
        • "created_by": "zack.oberbrunner",
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:35.520713Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:35.520713Z"
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/bookmarks/d620a26e-d05e-43c1-a658-586ab326df90",
        • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Show bookmark

Show a bookmark for a specific project, environment or asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

bookmark_id
required
string
Example: 7a77c59b-8781-4628-ab98-d8b60edcd31f

bookmark id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/bookmarks/{bookmark_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "818c0619-da70-410d-ab69-9d2086f5c306",
    • "type": "bookmark",
    • "attributes": {
      • "url": "https://soa.project_asset.server:7002/admin/console",
      • "description": "SOA administration console",
      • "created_by": "addie",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:35.757198Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:35.757198Z"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/bookmarks/818c0619-da70-410d-ab69-9d2086f5c306",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
      }
    }
}

Update bookmark

Update a bookmark for a specific project, environment or asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

bookmark_id
required
string
Example: 7a77c59b-8781-4628-ab98-d8b60edcd31f

bookmark id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/bookmarks/{bookmark_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "url": "https://updated.server.com:8080/new/path",
      • "description": "Updated server console path"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "253da50e-5af2-4d73-b3e0-14b5025bef07",
    • "type": "bookmark",
    • "attributes": {
      • "url": "https://updated.server.com:8080/new/path",
      • "description": "Updated server console path",
      • "created_by": "anh",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:36.249984Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:36.295803Z"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/bookmarks/253da50e-5af2-4d73-b3e0-14b5025bef07",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
      }
    }
}

Delete a bookmark for a specific project, environment or asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

bookmark_id
required
string
Example: 7a77c59b-8781-4628-ab98-d8b60edcd31f

bookmark id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/bookmarks/{bookmark_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

MintModels

Endpoints to query and generate MintModels for assets.

Notes:

  • The list, show and generate MintModel endpoints are available for all assets, via the /<path/to/mintmodel/owner>/mintmodels path. The example endpoints in this section reflect MintModels owned by a project asset.
  • The list and show endpoints will display all MintModels for the asset, regardless whether they were applied successfully or not. Use the parent_mintmodel_history link in the API response to access the asset's MintModel history.

List MintModel history

Lists the asset's MintModel history.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodel_history

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "8ed55793-d7b1-497b-b80d-3a49028c8dd2",
      • "type": "mintmodel_history",
      • "attributes": {
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:49.264634Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:49.264634Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "parents": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "4df81e80-9327-46f0-aae7-9ccf30db85a2",
              • "type": "project"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "164d1176-8254-409a-8384-fd4aa3190fe2",
              • "type": "asset"
              }
            ]
          },
        • "mintmodel": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "e4bb6eb9-bbae-404f-9157-499e04b2623d",
            • "type": "mintmodel"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/e4bb6eb9-bbae-404f-9157-499e04b2623d"
            }
          },
        • "opschain_changes": {
          • "data": [ ]
          },
        • "template_version": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "b2b743be-9d5d-4741-9afd-d7772406311d",
            • "type": "template_version"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history/8ed55793-d7b1-497b-b80d-3a49028c8dd2"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

Show MintModel history

Shows an asset's MintModel history record.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

id
required
string
Example: cf4545d0-32f9-47a7-b1e1-38aaa77e2762

MintModel history id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodel_history/{id}

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "efa86576-ea25-464d-8e1b-a2a6908ee504",
    • "type": "mintmodel_history",
    • "attributes": {
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:49.523968Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:49.523968Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "e02eec4e-79fd-4669-a9f2-5cecb7fbc74c",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "47668efa-664b-4c16-ae97-aa6f16b7e3b0",
            • "type": "asset"
            }
          ]
        },
      • "mintmodel": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "c4adccb6-d32b-4fbe-af29-5122d8903ffc",
          • "type": "mintmodel"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/c4adccb6-d32b-4fbe-af29-5122d8903ffc"
          }
        },
      • "opschain_changes": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "template_version": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "f4ab6d09-86b3-4749-bc7e-fc1c3fc3e31f",
          • "type": "template_version"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history/efa86576-ea25-464d-8e1b-a2a6908ee504"
      }
    },
  • "included": [
    • {
      • "id": "c4adccb6-d32b-4fbe-af29-5122d8903ffc",
      • "type": "mintmodel",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "complex": {
            • "json": {
              • "mintmodel": "data"
              }
            }
          },
        • "sha256": "77526a9ef926aee8c98f90ec845f5bd12f58cd7afb29fb2db5ef8f95deec44f8",
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:49.519024Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:49.519024Z",
        • "render_logs": "MintPress renderer output"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "mintmodel_history": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "efa86576-ea25-464d-8e1b-a2a6908ee504",
              • "type": "mintmodel_history"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "7aae1220-81cc-4ec1-a94e-18b18edcedaa",
              • "type": "mintmodel_history"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/c4adccb6-d32b-4fbe-af29-5122d8903ffc",
        • "parent_mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Generate MintModel diff

Generate a MintModel of the differences between two existing MintModels.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodels

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "old_mintmodel_id": "b5c8c0b6-3ab0-4b3b-8161-fd3e88101c87",
      • "new_mintmodel_id": "6a9b5f74-2d32-4c6d-be65-d63edffbc18f"
      }
    }
}

  • 201
  • 400
  • 422

List MintModels

List all MintModels for an asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodels

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "9082a5e0-06fd-40d7-8ed5-4b1721d231b0",
      • "type": "mintmodel",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "complex": {
            • "json": {
              • "mintmodel": "data"
              }
            }
          },
        • "sha256": "77526a9ef926aee8c98f90ec845f5bd12f58cd7afb29fb2db5ef8f95deec44f8",
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:50.486621Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:50.486621Z",
        • "render_logs": "MintPress renderer output"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "mintmodel_history": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "6d80887f-362d-44d6-8dff-e9d2bbe51d44",
              • "type": "mintmodel_history"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/9082a5e0-06fd-40d7-8ed5-4b1721d231b0",
        • "parent_mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Show MintModel

Shows an asset MintModel.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

mintmodel_id
required
string
Example: 534f3c5a-bb2a-4244-82ed-f95dd2c726c9

MintModel id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodels/{mintmodel_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
