      }
    }
}

Generate MintModel

Generate the MintModel for this asset, using the latest properties and template version.

Note: The endpoint does not store the MintModel, rather it provides a point in time reference for the MintModel content that will be used by a change if one is executed for the asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodels/generate

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "558d1b0f-b385-47ca-8d8e-7e1f2f4ef053",
    • "type": "mintmodel",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "complex": {
          • "json": {
            • "mintmodel": "data"
            }
          }
        },
      • "sha256": "77526a9ef926aee8c98f90ec845f5bd12f58cd7afb29fb2db5ef8f95deec44f8",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:51.229702Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:51.229702Z",
      • "render_logs": "MintPress renderer output"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "mintmodel_history": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "a3f98664-44c7-44d9-afb0-1863cb8db04c",
            • "type": "mintmodel_history"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/558d1b0f-b385-47ca-8d8e-7e1f2f4ef053",
      • "parent_mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history"
      }
    }
}

Workflows

Endpoints to interact with enterprise project workflows

List workflows

Lists all workflows for a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows

Response samples

  • 200
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "396bd908-7a9d-4b7f-8da5-14f9d200e65a",
      • "type": "workflow",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "assets",
        • "name": "assets workflow",
        • "description": "workflow for assets",
        • "draft": false,
        • "archived": false,
        • "created_by": "irwin.boehm",
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:33.320234Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:33.320257Z",
        • "source_yaml": "---\ncode: assets\nname: assets workflow\ndescription: workflow for assets\ncreated_by: irwin.boehm\nsteps:\n- type: change\n name: run asset action\n target: \"/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa\"\n action: run\n",
        • "steps": [
          • {
            • "name": "run asset action",
            • "type": "change",
            • "action": "run",
            • "target": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
            }
          ],
        • "resolved_steps": [ ],
        • "sample_properties": {
          • "sample": "value"
          },
        • "latest_version": 1,
        • "notifications": { },
        • "latest_published_version": 1
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "versions": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "482b2971-85f7-4c81-98d1-8324e779d496",
              • "type": "workflow_version"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets",
        • "runs": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs",
        • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "versions": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions",
        • "latest_version": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/1",
        • "latest_published_version": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/1"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

Create workflow

Create a workflow

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "szrvl",
      • "name": "input",
      • "description": "Copying the sensor won't do anything, we need to compress the cross-platform hdd bus!",
      • "steps": [
        • {
          • "type": "change",
          • "targets": [
            • "/projects/8s5to/environments/j2fug/assets/o4sb7",
            • "/projects/votlw/environments/jfndi/assets/4de6r"
            ],
          • "action": "synthesize",
          • "template_versions": [
            • "fs84b",
            • "c0g9i"
            ],
          • "run_as": "parallel",
          • "name": "illo"
          },
        • {
          • "type": "wait",
          • "requires_approval_from": "rerum",
          • "name": "voluptatem"
          },
        • {
          • "type": "workflow",
          • "target": "/projects/refox/workflows/i8eky",
          • "version": null,
          • "name": "voluptatem",
          • "start_time": null
          },
        • {
          • "run_as": "parallel",
          • "name": "et",
          • "children": [
            • {
              • "type": "change",
              • "target": "/projects/lylzc/environments/14ytr/assets/fehzf",
              • "action": "compress",
              • "template_version": "jgpuv",
              • "name": "nostrum",
              • "start_time": null
              },
            • {
              • "type": "wait",
              • "requires_approval_from": null,
              • "name": "temporibus"
              },
            • {
              • "type": "workflow",
              • "target": "/projects/fu7da/workflows/uuqtg",
              • "version": 1,
              • "name": "facilis",
              • "start_time": "2025-09-12T00:45:20Z"
              }
            ]
          },
        • {
          • "run_as": "sequential",
          • "name": "voluptatibus",
          • "children": [
            • {
              • "type": "change",
              • "target": "/projects/cadwz/environments/tn8sd/assets/fv4tp",
              • "action": "compress",
              • "template_version": "ph4xd",
              • "name": "vel",
              • "start_time": "2025-09-12T00:45:20Z"
              },
            • {
              • "type": "wait",
              • "requires_approval_from": null,
              • "name": "enim"
              },
            • {
              • "type": "workflow",
              • "target": "/projects/d7bfw/workflows/h4au0",
              • "version": null,
              • "name": "aut",
              • "start_time": null
              }
            ]
          }
        ],
      • "archived": false,
      • "draft": true,
      • "source_yaml": "---\ncode: szrvl\nname: input\ndescription: Copying the sensor won't do anything, we need to compress the cross-platform\n hdd bus!\ncreated_by: dave.kuhn\nsteps:\n- action: hack\n target: \"/projects/uaajq/assets/ysr89\"\n type: change\n",
      • "notifications": { },
      • "sample_properties": {
        • "sample": "value"
        }
      }
    }
}

  • 404
  • 422
Content type

Show workflow

Shows a workflow.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "384e73d3-0870-483d-a837-cd3200cf90a8",
    • "type": "workflow",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "assets",
      • "name": "assets workflow",
      • "description": "workflow for assets",
      • "draft": false,
      • "archived": false,

      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:35.438100Z",

Update workflow

Update a workflow.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "generate",
      • "description": "You can't input the circuit without connecting the redundant SDD card!",
      • "steps": [
        • {
          • "type": "change",
          • "targets": [
            • "/projects/8s5to/environments/j2fug/assets/o4sb7",
            • "/projects/votlw/environments/jfndi/assets/4de6r"
            ],
          • "action": "synthesize",
          • "template_versions": [
            • "fs84b",
            • "c0g9i"
            ],
          • "run_as": "parallel",
          • "name": "illo"
          },
        • {
          • "type": "wait",
          • "requires_approval_from": "rerum",
          • "name": "voluptatem"
          },
        • {
          • "type": "workflow",
          • "target": "/projects/refox/workflows/i8eky",
          • "version": null,
          • "name": "voluptatem",
          • "start_time": null
          },
        • {
          • "run_as": "parallel",
          • "name": "et",
          • "children": [
            • {
              • "type": "change",
              • "target": "/projects/lylzc/environments/14ytr/assets/fehzf",
              • "action": "compress",
              • "template_version": "jgpuv",
              • "name": "nostrum",
              • "start_time": null
              },
            • {
              • "type": "wait",
              • "requires_approval_from": null,
              • "name": "temporibus"
              },
            • {
              • "type": "workflow",
              • "target": "/projects/fu7da/workflows/uuqtg",
              • "version": 1,
              • "name": "facilis",
              • "start_time": "2025-09-12T00:45:20Z"

            ]

        • {
          • "run_as": "sequential",
          • "name": "voluptatibus",
          • "children": [
            • {
              • "type": "change",

              • "action": "compress",
              • "template_version": "ph4xd",
              • "name": "vel",

Delete workflow

Delete or archive a workflow.

  • If the workflow has not been run before, it will be deleted.
  • If the workflow has been run before, it will be archived.
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Workflow versions

List workflow versions

Lists all versions for a workflow.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/versions

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "fcc52b61-e942-4841-8402-6446d8603ae5",
      • "type": "workflow_version",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "assets",
        • "name": "assets workflow",
        • "description": "workflow for assets",
        • "draft": false,
        • "archived": false,
        • "created_by": "billie",
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:28.988208Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:28.988208Z",
        • "source_yaml": "---\ncode: assets\nname: assets workflow\ndescription: workflow for assets\ncreated_by: billie\nsteps:\n- type: change\n name: run asset action\n target: \"/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa\"\n action: run\n",
        • "steps": [
          • {
            • "name": "run asset action",
            • "type": "change",
            • "action": "run",
            • "target": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
            }
          ],
        • "resolved_steps": [ ],
        • "sample_properties": {
          • "sample": "value"
          },
        • "version": 1
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/1",
        • "runs": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/1/runs",
        • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "workflow": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Delete draft workflow versions

Deletes all draft versions of a workflow.

Note: An exception will be raised if there are no published versions of the workflow.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/versions

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Delete workflow version

Delete or archive a workflow version.

  • If the workflow version has not been run before, it will be deleted.
  • If the workflow version has been run before, it will be archived.
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

version
required
string
Example: 1

version

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/versions/{version}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Properties

Endpoints to interact with properties.

Show properties

Shows the current properties JSON and its version.

path Parameters
properties_id
required
string
Example: abd97ecd-bcca-4bb3-86f7-4d5d312d760d

properties id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{properties_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "e5e0e94d-9d4f-4573-8f2c-74ed8fe9f905",
    • "type": "properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 1,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:00.801865Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/properties/e5e0e94d-9d4f-4573-8f2c-74ed8fe9f905",
      • "current_version": "/api/properties/e5e0e94d-9d4f-4573-8f2c-74ed8fe9f905/versions/1",
      • "versions": "/api/properties/e5e0e94d-9d4f-4573-8f2c-74ed8fe9f905/versions"
      }
    }
}

Update properties

Updates a properties JSON if the included version matches the current properties version.

path Parameters
id_to_update
required
string
Example: abd97ecd-bcca-4bb3-86f7-4d5d312d760d

properties id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{id_to_update}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 1
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "f0c224f4-bb8e-49f2-bdcc-9e9bf1749c15",
    • "type": "properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 2,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:01.090359Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/properties/f0c224f4-bb8e-49f2-bdcc-9e9bf1749c15",
      • "current_version": "/api/properties/f0c224f4-bb8e-49f2-bdcc-9e9bf1749c15/versions/2",
      • "versions": "/api/properties/f0c224f4-bb8e-49f2-bdcc-9e9bf1749c15/versions"
      }
    }
}

Update properties (unsafe)

Updates a properties JSON, without any version checking (always updates).

path Parameters
id_to_set
required
string
Example: abd97ecd-bcca-4bb3-86f7-4d5d312d760d

properties id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{id_to_set}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        }
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "c1147190-8411-476c-a8f2-ed7072e8a504",
    • "type": "properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 2,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:02.050801Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/properties/c1147190-8411-476c-a8f2-ed7072e8a504",
      • "current_version": "/api/properties/c1147190-8411-476c-a8f2-ed7072e8a504/versions/2",
      • "versions": "/api/properties/c1147190-8411-476c-a8f2-ed7072e8a504/versions"
      }
    }
}

Properties versions

Endpoints to interact with the version history for properties.

List properties versions

Lists all versions of an OpsChain properties.

path Parameters
properties_id
required
string
Example: abd97ecd-bcca-4bb3-86f7-4d5d312d760d

properties id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{properties_id}/versions

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "db1c6278-b7c3-4411-ae5e-8a15a0709cd6",
      • "type": "properties_version",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "any_key": "with a value",
          • "another_key": "with a different value",
          • "nested": {
            • "key": "nested value"
            }
          },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:02.487946Z",
        • "owner_type": "Project"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "37685659-883b-4ce5-974c-458bddf7966d",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/37685659-883b-4ce5-974c-458bddf7966d"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "versions": "/api/properties/37685659-883b-4ce5-974c-458bddf7966d/versions",
        • "owner": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "self": "/api/properties/37685659-883b-4ce5-974c-458bddf7966d/versions/1"
        },
      • "meta": { }
      }
    ]
}

Show properties version

Shows the properties JSON for this properties version.

path Parameters
properties_id
required
string
Example: abd97ecd-bcca-4bb3-86f7-4d5d312d760d

properties id

version_number
required
integer
Example: 1

version number

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{properties_id}/versions/{version_number}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "1b04d590-49e6-48fb-9601-34f375b3e589",
    • "type": "properties_version",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 1,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:02.750267Z",
      • "owner_type": "Project"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "476c94b1-bb0c-4dfb-a7f7-c871f83ab74a",
          • "type": "properties"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/properties/476c94b1-bb0c-4dfb-a7f7-c871f83ab74a"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "versions": "/api/properties/476c94b1-bb0c-4dfb-a7f7-c871f83ab74a/versions",
      • "owner": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "self": "/api/properties/476c94b1-bb0c-4dfb-a7f7-c871f83ab74a/versions/1"
      },
    • "meta": { }
    }
}

Changes

Endpoints to interact with changes.

List changes

Lists all changes.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[environment_code_eq]=dev

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=changes.csv

Download changes in CSV format with the specified file name. The changes will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

include
string
Example: include=steps,parents

Include the change steps and parents in the response

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "54158895-aa5c-4f2b-b6c8-5b450b324baf",

            • "read": true,
            • "execute": true

            • "update": true
            }
          }

      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false,
    • "has_any": true
    }
}

Create change

Creates a change in a specific project, environment or asset.

Notes:

  1. When creating changes via a project, environment or asset changes path (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/changes) the parent_path request attributes must not be supplied as the parent will be derived from the path.
  2. When creating changes for assets (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/changes) the git_remote_name and git_rev attributes must not be supplied as the Git remote and revision will be derived from the asset's template.
Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "metadata": {
        • "hard drive": "generating"
        },
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "monitor": "backing up"
        },
      • "scheduled_activity_id": null,
      • "build_without_cache": false,
      • "pod_per_step": true,
      • "action": "navigate",
      • "parent_path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev/assets/env_soa",
      • "template_version": "2023_Q4_2"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "3af68a0a-bdeb-449f-892b-dad649f159e8",
    • "type": "change",
    • "attributes": {

        • "log_lines": "/api/steps/f5be19bc-5a45-49a2-8400-f6496aa16ca8/log_lines",
        • "self": "/api/steps/f5be19bc-5a45-49a2-8400-f6496aa16ca8"
        },
      • "meta": { }
      }
    ]
}

Show change

Shows a change, including it's parent nodes.

path Parameters
change_id
required
string
Example: a9f170e3-4244-42a6-9b59-736fc6fde45f

change id

query Parameters
include
string
Example: include=steps,parents

Include the change steps and parents in the response

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes/{change_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json

Cancel change

Cancels a change.

path Parameters
change_id
required
string
Example: a9f170e3-4244-42a6-9b59-736fc6fde45f

change id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes/{change_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Scheduled activities

List activities

Lists all scheduled activities.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[project_code_eq]=opc

API filtering guide

include
string
Example: include=parents

Include the scheduled change parents in the response

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "0f55f915-1a24-4a7d-aea4-df42a255e8ae",

Create activities

Creates a scheduled activity in a specific project, environment or asset.

Notes:

  1. When creating scheduled activities via a project, environment or asset scheduled_activities path (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/scheduled_activities) the parent_path request attributes must not be supplied as the parent will be derived from the path.

  2. When creating scheduled activities for assets (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/scheduled_activities) the git_remote_name and git_rev attributes must not be supplied as the Git remote and revision will be derived from the asset's template.

  3. See the various payload examples to understand the required fields for each possible request to this endpoint.

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "git_rev": "master",
      • "action": "install_os",
      • "cron_schedule": "28 8 5 4 5",
      • "new_commits_only": false,
      • "repeat": true,
      • "metadata": {
        • "array": "calculating"
        },
      • "run_at": null,
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "allow_parallel_execution": false,
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "pixel": "overriding"
        },
      • "parent_path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "1cce62d3-9127-4819-b4b1-76424fa6b651",
    • "type": "scheduled_change",
    • "attributes": {
      • "created_by": "millard",
      • "cron_schedule": "22 21 1 2 4",
      • "repeat": true,
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "enabled": true,
      • "allow_parallel_execution": false,
      • "metadata": {
        • "port": "calculating"
        },
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "protocol": "transmitting"
        },
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:29.914500Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:29.914500Z",
      • "next_run_at": "2026-02-01T10:22:00.000000Z",
      • "run_at": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "action": "different_action",
      • "new_commits_only": true,
      • "git_rev": "bluetooth",
      • "project_name": "OpsChain",
      • "project_code": "opc",
      • "asset_code": null,
      • "asset_name": null,
      • "environment_code": "dev",
      • "environment_name": "Development",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "8ac8b282-e39d-4da7-8079-d42f701ecfc4",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "409e1e6c-2a3f-4255-8fff-b5ed88daf25b",
            • "type": "environment"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "git_remote": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/e5148b33-fc9e-4061-ac82-08d5eb59c512",
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "self": "/api/scheduled_activities/1cce62d3-9127-4819-b4b1-76424fa6b651"
      }
    }
}

Show activity

Shows a scheduled activity.

path Parameters
scheduled_change_id
required
string
Example: a827c221-fabd-4552-8ee8-e2080c25c007

scheduled change id

query Parameters
include
string
Example: include=parents

Include the scheduled change parents in the response

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities/{scheduled_change_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "1171d765-38f2-45c3-9bfe-c1a7f86c6a17",
    • "type": "scheduled_change",

      • "created_by": "alita_kuphal",

Update activity

Updates a scheduled activity in a specific project, environment or asset.

Notes:

  1. When updating activities via a project, environment or asset scheduled_activities path (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/scheduled_activities) the parent_path request attributes must not be supplied as the parent will be derived from the path.
  2. When updating activities for assets (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/scheduled_activities) the git_remote_name and git_rev attributes must not be supplied as the Git remote and revision will be derived from the asset's template.
  3. See the various payload examples to understand the attributes you can supply to this endpoint.
  4. The payload need only consist of the attributes you wish to modify. There is no need to supply the entire scheduled activity.
path Parameters
scheduled_change_id
required
string
Example: a827c221-fabd-4552-8ee8-e2080c25c007

scheduled change id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities/{scheduled_change_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "git_rev": "master",
      • "action": "install_os",
      • "cron_schedule": "15 16 10 11 4",
      • "new_commits_only": true,
      • "repeat": true,
      • "metadata": {
        • "application": "synthesizing"
        },
      • "run_at": null,
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "allow_parallel_execution": false,
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "firewall": "calculating"
        },
      • "parent_path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "506820ee-4c05-4a4d-a5ce-16bfb3060811",
    • "type": "scheduled_change",
    • "attributes": {
      • "created_by": "elois.pouros",
      • "cron_schedule": "3 3 20 2 *",
      • "repeat": true,
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "maximum_run_count": 5,
      • "enabled": true,
      • "allow_parallel_execution": false,
      • "metadata": {
        • "matrix": "indexing"
        },
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "new": "property",
        • "value": "overrides"
        },
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:31.976610Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:32.269630Z",
      • "next_run_at": "2026-02-19T16:03:00.000000Z",
      • "run_at": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "action": "new_action",
      • "new_commits_only": false,
      • "git_rev": "haptic",
      • "project_name": "OpsChain",
      • "project_code": "opc",
      • "asset_code": null,
      • "asset_name": null,
      • "environment_code": "dev",
      • "environment_name": "Development",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "d5d147b3-48fb-434a-b6f3-361292017046",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "1bf2e31b-9c15-4074-905f-84a729d8ad62",
            • "type": "environment"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "git_remote": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/64e4f094-d3f2-4ac1-a388-13a71d759746",
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "self": "/api/scheduled_activities/506820ee-4c05-4a4d-a5ce-16bfb3060811"
      }
    }
}

Delete activity

Delete a scheduled activity.

path Parameters
scheduled_change_id
required
string
Example: a827c221-fabd-4552-8ee8-e2080c25c007

scheduled change id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities/{scheduled_change_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Steps

Endpoints to interact with change steps.

List steps

Lists all steps.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[action_eq]=provision

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/steps

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "e892d8ef-8d03-43f4-b4a1-29ce37f62bc0",
      • "type": "step",
      • "attributes": {
        • "approved_by": [ ],
        • "rejected_by": [ ],
        • "continued_by": [ ],
        • "requires_approval_from": null,
        • "action": "override",
        • "name": "override",
        • "step_type": "standard",
        • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential",
        • "change_id": "959d154b-2904-4de7-9bee-314ca23800f9",
        • "skip_on_retry": false,
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:35:17.624619Z",
        • "started_at": "2025-09-11T00:36:17.624619Z",
        • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:39:10.440938Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:07.227018Z",
        • "status_code": "success"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "95e4b0c5-c8fd-4fc2-807f-a454190aa986",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/95e4b0c5-c8fd-4fc2-807f-a454190aa986"
            }
          },
        • "children": {
          • "data": [ ]
          },
        • "change": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "959d154b-2904-4de7-9bee-314ca23800f9",
            • "type": "change"
            }
          },
        • "properties_versions": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "1c344237-1fd4-42b3-ad5b-4943243b47dc",
              • "type": "properties_version"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "87e295d9-b8cd-49b3-948d-ad663f994fab",
              • "type": "properties_version"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "parent": "/api/changes/959d154b-2904-4de7-9bee-314ca23800f9",
        • "change": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/changes/959d154b-2904-4de7-9bee-314ca23800f9",
        • "log_lines": "/api/steps/e892d8ef-8d03-43f4-b4a1-29ce37f62bc0/log_lines",
        • "self": "/api/steps/e892d8ef-8d03-43f4-b4a1-29ce37f62bc0"
        },
      • "meta": { }
      }
    ]
}

Show step

Shows a change step.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 738d8d89-4a12-4def-b944-ff5070bed5ef

step id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/steps/{step_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "a5705ad6-be79-4a66-803d-1d1c3ac8e4cf",
    • "type": "step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [ ],
      • "requires_approval_from": null,
      • "action": "navigate",
      • "name": "navigate",
      • "step_type": "standard",
      • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential",
      • "change_id": "fbbf2c7a-eb65-4414-a9a3-46f4279f6e3d",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:35:59.377463Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-09-11T00:36:59.377463Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:40:48.932929Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:07.536540Z",
      • "status_code": "success"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "49886bb0-4b9c-402c-92d9-e48eed171cfa",
          • "type": "properties"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/properties/49886bb0-4b9c-402c-92d9-e48eed171cfa"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "change": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "fbbf2c7a-eb65-4414-a9a3-46f4279f6e3d",
          • "type": "change"
          }
        },
      • "properties_versions": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "b40bfb16-acd1-4879-b728-0261d2c30917",
            • "type": "properties_version"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "42345e22-cb61-4abf-9693-034aadd999d3",
            • "type": "properties_version"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "parent": "/api/changes/fbbf2c7a-eb65-4414-a9a3-46f4279f6e3d",
      • "change": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/changes/fbbf2c7a-eb65-4414-a9a3-46f4279f6e3d",
      • "log_lines": "/api/steps/a5705ad6-be79-4a66-803d-1d1c3ac8e4cf/log_lines",
      • "self": "/api/steps/a5705ad6-be79-4a66-803d-1d1c3ac8e4cf"
      },
    • "meta": {
      • "converge_errors": {
        • "base": [
          • "Failed to merge the \"navigate\" step's properties due to: failed to resolve path '/opt/opschain/opschain_project_git_repos/test/f4e8504b-cbba-43e0-98ba-b00cc0e8179f/4b042b8f-1f27-4dc0-8abf-8cdc6d5c13a3': No such file or directory"
          ]
        }
      }
    },
  • "included": [
    • {
      • "id": "b40bfb16-acd1-4879-b728-0261d2c30917",
      • "type": "properties_version",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "any_key": "with a value",
          • "another_key": "with a different value",
          • "nested": {
            • "key": "nested value"
            }
          },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:07.359244Z",
        • "owner_type": "Project"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "1cd92afa-5bc5-4d9a-be56-f6002fd81b66",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/1cd92afa-5bc5-4d9a-be56-f6002fd81b66"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "versions": "/api/properties/1cd92afa-5bc5-4d9a-be56-f6002fd81b66/versions",
        • "owner": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "self": "/api/properties/1cd92afa-5bc5-4d9a-be56-f6002fd81b66/versions/1"
        },
      • "meta": { }
      },
    • {
      • "id": "42345e22-cb61-4abf-9693-034aadd999d3",
      • "type": "properties_version",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": { },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:07.403115Z",
        • "owner_type": "Environment"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "c951d7c7-e2f3-4d9e-bec0-29b40c7bdd7b",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/c951d7c7-e2f3-4d9e-bec0-29b40c7bdd7b"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "versions": "/api/properties/c951d7c7-e2f3-4d9e-bec0-29b40c7bdd7b/versions",
        • "owner": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev",
        • "self": "/api/properties/c951d7c7-e2f3-4d9e-bec0-29b40c7bdd7b/versions/1"
        },
      • "meta": { }
      },
    • {
      • "id": "49886bb0-4b9c-402c-92d9-e48eed171cfa",
      • "type": "properties",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "any_key": "with a value",
          • "another_key": "with a different value",
          • "nested": {
            • "key": "nested value"
            }
          },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:07.529373Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "owner": {
          • "links": {
            • "owner": "/api/steps/a5705ad6-be79-4a66-803d-1d1c3ac8e4cf"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/properties/49886bb0-4b9c-402c-92d9-e48eed171cfa",
        • "current_version": "/api/properties/49886bb0-4b9c-402c-92d9-e48eed171cfa/versions/1",
        • "versions": "/api/properties/49886bb0-4b9c-402c-92d9-e48eed171cfa/versions"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Update step

Update a step to flag it to be skipped on retry.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 738d8d89-4a12-4def-b944-ff5070bed5ef

step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/steps/{step_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "skip_on_retry": true
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "1a9e9342-e477-4e71-a125-285e722b413b",
    • "type": "step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [ ],
      • "requires_approval_from": null,
      • "action": "override",
      • "name": "override",
      • "step_type": "standard",
      • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential",
      • "change_id": "9c090828-60b5-4d6e-b5e5-8bba15aa2013",
      • "skip_on_retry": true,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:39:32.896943Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-09-11T00:40:32.896943Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:40:48.254151Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:08.231173Z",
      • "status_code": "error"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "e2383403-0ffa-4d4a-a336-6d4ef68ac8fb",
          • "type": "properties"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/properties/e2383403-0ffa-4d4a-a336-6d4ef68ac8fb"
          }

      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "change": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "9c090828-60b5-4d6e-b5e5-8bba15aa2013",
          • "type": "change"

        },

        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "dae805ad-c2e1-42ea-a36f-4dafd9fcfb8b",

      • "log_lines": "/api/steps/1a9e9342-e477-4e71-a125-285e722b413b/log_lines",
      • "self": "/api/steps/1a9e9342-e477-4e71-a125-285e722b413b"
      },
    • "meta": { }
    }
}

Continue step

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 28004f78-db64-4419-9e7d-53298e1d5309

step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Manually removed from load balancer."

    }

  • 422

required
string
Example: 28004f78-db64-4419-9e7d-53298e1d5309

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

      }
    }

Reject step

Rejects a change step that needs approval.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 28004f78-db64-4419-9e7d-53298e1d5309

step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/steps/{step_id}/reject

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Failed user acceptance testing"
      }
    }
}

  • 403
  • 404

Log lines

Endpoints to query log lines for changes and individual change steps.

List change log lines

List the log lines for a change.

path Parameters
change_id
required
string
Example: a9f170e3-4244-42a6-9b59-736fc6fde45f
query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=change.log

Download the log lines wth the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes/{change_id}/log_lines

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "26652f30-e4d9-48f7-844c-d30614fcf694",
      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "message": "Velit est culpa tempore.",
        • "change_id": "cf945abd-40ea-4b0a-96dc-e5a2f41ceaa6",
        • "step_id": "18a5c534-5778-4510-b305-c4cabde1531c",
        • "logged_at": "2025-09-10T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

List step log lines

List the log lines for a change step.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 738d8d89-4a12-4def-b944-ff5070bed5ef
query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=step.log

Download the log lines wth the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/steps/{step_id}/log_lines

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "17ed4eba-fa4a-478d-acf3-61c2689edb8d",
      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "message": "Illum sunt officiis possimus.",
        • "change_id": "e6b7fbc8-7cb7-47fe-b438-ef05daf06ac1",
        • "step_id": "85fbc417-faf7-4f55-92d9-5e82e251f0e3",
        • "logged_at": "2025-09-10T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

List filtered log lines

List filtered log lines.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

limit
integer [ 1 .. null ]
Default: 10000
Example: limit=50

Limit the number of log lines returned

download
string
Example: download=opschain.log

Download the filtered log lines wth the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/log_lines

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "4d25cdfb-e250-49ab-a691-f8316538d4c7",
      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "message": "Asperiores recusandae facilis sint.",
        • "change_id": "bc68f624-57d2-4155-84a4-dad7eea87007",
        • "step_id": "061f4236-4af6-4999-a669-f98245e6af76",
        • "logged_at": "2025-09-10T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

required

filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

limit
integer [ 1 .. null ]
Default: 10000
Example: limit=50

string
Example: download=opschain.log

Download the filtered log lines wth the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "7024e29a-a8be-4759-884e-aadb2a5770ba",
      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "message": "Ut suscipit totam nam.",
        • "workflow_run_id": "f9730ee0-4a7b-4612-9a87-8562a8cc4736",
        • "workflow_step_id": "8dbafc76-0c55-4b65-b620-4e6308ce5707",
        • "logged_at": "2025-09-10T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

Workflow runs

Endpoints to interact with workflow runs

Notes:

  • The list and show endpoints are available via the following paths:
    1. /workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs accessible to the user.
    2. /project/{project_code}/workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs for all this project's workflows.
    3. /project/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs this workflow.
    4. /<path/to/asset>/workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs that include a change for this asset.

List all workflow runs

Lists all workflow runs.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "a254f0d0-5ca5-4688-a6d3-a98f50cc8adf",

Run a workflow

Runs a pre-defined workflow

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "project_code": "opc",
      • "workflow_code": "assets",
      • "version": 1,
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "additional": "properties"
        },
      • "metadata": {
        • "optional": "metadata"
        }
      }
    }
}

Show workflow run

Shows a workflow run.

path Parameters
run_id
required
string
Example: 5f5a0f19-f747-4ae7-8ade-6bcd0cae4fd2

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs/{run_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "2c82cd19-302a-4bba-82cb-0d05d7401e13",
    • "type": "workflow_run",
    • "attributes": {
      • "step_tree": {

            }

    • "links": {
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/2c82cd19-302a-4bba-82cb-0d05d7401e13",
      • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_runs/2c82cd19-302a-4bba-82cb-0d05d7401e13/log_lines"
      },
    • "meta": {
      • "parallel_workflows_allowed": false,
      • "blocked_by_same_workflow_running": false,
      • "blocked_by_queue": [ ]
      }
    },
  • "included": [
    • {
      • "id": "c3e61d14-cc54-486b-9886-eade41ffbea4",

Cancel workflow run

Cancels a workflow run.

path Parameters
run_id
required
string
Example: 5f5a0f19-f747-4ae7-8ade-6bcd0cae4fd2

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs/{run_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

List workflow runs (workflow specific)

Lists all runs for a workflow.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs

Run a workflow (workflow specific)

Runs a pre-defined workflow

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "version": 1,
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "additional": "properties"
        },
      • "metadata": {
        • "optional": "metadata"
        }
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {

Show workflow run (workflow specific)

Shows a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: 5f5a0f19-f747-4ae7-8ade-6bcd0cae4fd2

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "8ea13a68-d694-4629-b69b-2c726b1bdb93",

}

Cancel workflow run (workflow specific)

Cancels a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: 5f5a0f19-f747-4ae7-8ade-6bcd0cae4fd2

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Workflow steps

Endpoints to interact with the steps in a workflow run

List all workflow steps

Lists all workflow steps.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json

        • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/dc7d2a9d-4218-4dc6-9d5e-66e09ee3cb33/log_lines",
        • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/adcc4c3e-bafe-4001-8597-8d7959360c8e/steps/3b659fe8-8c4e-4462-bc99-4146a07b488b",
        • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/adcc4c3e-bafe-4001-8597-8d7959360c8e"
        }
      },
    • {
      • "id": "5b4ad8e4-7567-418c-b5ff-5f2059cb9a6f",
      • "type": "workflow_workflow_step",
      • "attributes": {
        • "lock_version": 1,
        • "created_by": "josette",
        • "name": "child workflow",
        • "skip_on_retry": false,
        • "notifications": { },
        • "status_code": "pending",
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:45.827996Z",
        • "started_at": null,
        • "finished_at": null,
        • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:45.833152Z",
        • "code": "child"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "child_workflow_version": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "b0111c88-a2cb-4a2e-96e7-854251acdfac",
            • "type": "workflow_version"
            }
          },
        • "child_workflow_run": {
          • "data": null
          },
        • "workflow_run": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "adcc4c3e-bafe-4001-8597-8d7959360c8e",
            • "type": "workflow_run"
            }
          },
        • "children": {
          • "data": [ ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/adcc4c3e-bafe-4001-8597-8d7959360c8e/steps/5b4ad8e4-7567-418c-b5ff-5f2059cb9a6f",
        • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/5b4ad8e4-7567-418c-b5ff-5f2059cb9a6f/log_lines",
        • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/adcc4c3e-bafe-4001-8597-8d7959360c8e/steps/3b659fe8-8c4e-4462-bc99-4146a07b488b",
        • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/adcc4c3e-bafe-4001-8597-8d7959360c8e"
        }
      }
    ],

      • "update": false
      },

    }
}

Show a workflow step

Shows a workflow step.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 577f3717-8b40-4230-baee-3a77601aa2a4

workflow step id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "fc0c2369-a913-4653-a86e-8bcb0744aad1",
    • "type": "workflow_noop_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "lock_version": 0,
      • "created_by": "arla",
      • "name": "occaecati",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "success",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:46.605159Z",

      • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:44:56.331180Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:46.605159Z",

      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "c2f1efb3-96a1-499e-b6fd-3700ac31157c",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [
          • {

Update a workflow step

Update a workflow step to flag it to be skipped on retry.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 577f3717-8b40-4230-baee-3a77601aa2a4

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "skip_on_retry": true
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "41f784ae-f122-42db-b788-b6ba6c3095f2",
    • "type": "workflow_change_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "lock_version": 3,
      • "created_by": "malisa",
      • "name": "transmit",
      • "skip_on_retry": true,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "error",

      • "started_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:50.299394Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:50.299403Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:50.339417Z",
      • "action": "transmit",
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "array": "indexing"
        }
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "change": {
        • "data": null
        },
      • "change_parent": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "a6dd740b-96b4-4a41-9f92-f828c5c9c3d8",
          • "type": "asset"
          }
        },
      • "action_template_version": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "d92ffe7b-b979-4623-93b8-bdcd62a9f7d5",

          }

        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },

      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/ff18d35a-bab4-42a9-b797-42d8f71d9f36"
      }
    }
}

Continue workflow step

Continues a "waiting" workflow step. To approve/reject a workflow step that needs approval see the approve workflow step API endpoint.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: d5a1609e-895e-4f4d-9089-52b82b36deb0

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}/continue

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Done sanity checks. Ok to continue."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "f57f5ec5-e432-48b2-8157-6849bdd38030",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "ellie.leffler",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "requires_approval_from": null,
      • "lock_version": 2,
      • "created_by": "rob_goldner",
      • "name": "Wait",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "continued",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:37:57.373892Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-09-11T00:38:57.373892Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:53.905463Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:53.922531Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "ca29cff5-e71b-468f-8fc5-b3095254f54a",

          }
        },
      • "children": {

      },

Approve workflow step

Approve a workflow step that requires approval. To continue a workflow step that does need approval see the continue workflow step API endpoint

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: d5a1609e-895e-4f4d-9089-52b82b36deb0

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}/approve

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Ok to proceed."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 403
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {

List workflow steps (run specific)

Lists all steps in a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: 5f5a0f19-f747-4ae7-8ade-6bcd0cae4fd2

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps

Response samples

  • 200
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{

Show workflow step (run specific)

Shows a step of a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: 5f5a0f19-f747-4ae7-8ade-6bcd0cae4fd2

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: 577f3717-8b40-4230-baee-3a77601aa2a4

workflow step id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "86b72a78-bfaf-4974-9094-5ada56ec8733",
    • "type": "workflow_noop_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "lock_version": 0,
      • "created_by": "rupert.ward",
      • "name": "deserunt",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "success",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:10.476065Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-09-11T00:39:02.072544Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:42:44.288222Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:10.476065Z",
      • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "393e349e-beaa-4206-a18e-67d13afc083d",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "5b9e316a-fc54-4a1b-a372-bde1d8cbd079",
            • "type": "workflow_wait_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "2bff620d-30ea-4aa5-b9fd-db4f9bc4390c",
            • "type": "workflow_noop_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "af37a3c3-5335-4956-8c79-29a48d473c4e",
            • "type": "workflow_change_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "ecc3b62a-f883-4659-b2e5-2c9a14548a70",
            • "type": "workflow_wait_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "ec4e1e8f-142b-4fd0-a3e2-16242462f9d2",
            • "type": "workflow_workflow_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "9047f457-a878-4138-bceb-708ec965d24a",
            • "type": "workflow_change_step"

            • "type": "workflow_workflow_step"

          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/393e349e-beaa-4206-a18e-67d13afc083d/steps/86b72a78-bfaf-4974-9094-5ada56ec8733",
      • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/86b72a78-bfaf-4974-9094-5ada56ec8733/log_lines",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/393e349e-beaa-4206-a18e-67d13afc083d",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/393e349e-beaa-4206-a18e-67d13afc083d"
      }
    }
}

Continue workflow step (run specific)

Continues a "waiting" workflow step. To approve/reject a workflow step that needs approval see the approve workflow step API endpoint.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: 5f5a0f19-f747-4ae7-8ade-6bcd0cae4fd2

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: d5a1609e-895e-4f4d-9089-52b82b36deb0

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}/continue

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Done sanity checks. Ok to continue."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "7bd6212b-b017-42af-ba11-7be7d7791530",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "gail",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "requires_approval_from": null,
      • "lock_version": 2,
      • "created_by": "gwyneth",
      • "name": "Wait",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "continued",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:37:48.835825Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-09-11T00:38:48.835825Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:15.243751Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:15.260979Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "c3bc7d88-4f37-4292-8c89-f75d7b22ac04",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/c3bc7d88-4f37-4292-8c89-f75d7b22ac04/steps/7bd6212b-b017-42af-ba11-7be7d7791530",
      • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/7bd6212b-b017-42af-ba11-7be7d7791530/log_lines",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/c3bc7d88-4f37-4292-8c89-f75d7b22ac04/steps/95074bc2-c7d3-4c45-a8ba-dc0b7606c878",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/c3bc7d88-4f37-4292-8c89-f75d7b22ac04"
      }
    }
}

Approve workflow step (run specific)

Approve a workflow step that requires approval. To continue a workflow step that does need approval see the continue workflow step API endpoint

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: 5f5a0f19-f747-4ae7-8ade-6bcd0cae4fd2

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: d5a1609e-895e-4f4d-9089-52b82b36deb0

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}/approve

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Ok to proceed."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 403
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "7be47ed0-b6f2-490a-a11e-9a33cc41212f",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "fannie_stiedemann",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],

      • "continued_by": [ ],

      • "lock_version": 2,
      • "created_by": "walton_hane",
      • "name": "Approval",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "approved",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:38:09.507778Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-09-11T00:39:09.507778Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:19.287583Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:19.303433Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "af6d45d7-9ca3-444e-8740-c6e8ee543114",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/af6d45d7-9ca3-444e-8740-c6e8ee543114/steps/7be47ed0-b6f2-490a-a11e-9a33cc41212f",
      • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/7be47ed0-b6f2-490a-a11e-9a33cc41212f/log_lines",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/af6d45d7-9ca3-444e-8740-c6e8ee543114/steps/5b8c58ee-75e3-4c92-aab6-eb051704bb6e",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/af6d45d7-9ca3-444e-8740-c6e8ee543114"
      }
    }
}

Reject workflow step (run specific)

Reject a workflow step that requires approval.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: 5f5a0f19-f747-4ae7-8ade-6bcd0cae4fd2

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: d5a1609e-895e-4f4d-9089-52b82b36deb0

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}/reject

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Ok to proceed."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 403
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "b54fb32d-4853-4f46-addf-2408dd7bb03a",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "loren_okon",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "continued_by": [ ],
      • "requires_approval_from": "an-ldap-group",
      • "lock_version": 2,
      • "created_by": "janean",
      • "name": "Approval",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "rejected",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:37:43.624192Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-09-11T00:38:43.624192Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:24.415406Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:47:24.419930Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "24f89bc8-424f-4e54-b1eb-8e20834ce9b6",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/24f89bc8-424f-4e54-b1eb-8e20834ce9b6/steps/b54fb32d-4853-4f46-addf-2408dd7bb03a",
      • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/b54fb32d-4853-4f46-addf-2408dd7bb03a/log_lines",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/24f89bc8-424f-4e54-b1eb-8e20834ce9b6/steps/abb2c0ca-3ea2-44f6-a8f1-3ca7847f8406",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/24f89bc8-424f-4e54-b1eb-8e20834ce9b6"
      }
    }
}

Events

Endpoints to interact with events.

List events

Lists all events.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[query_param_code_eq]=opc

API filtering guide

limit
integer [ 1 .. 1000 ]
Default: 10
Example: limit=50

Limit the number of events returned

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/events

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "a710a761-40bf-44d3-8f3f-d84689809671",
      • "type": "event",
      • "attributes": {
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          },
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "username": "doretta.haley",
        • "system": false,
        • "type": "my custom event",
        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:41.961647Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "source": {
          • "links": {
            • "source": "/api/projects/opc"
            },
          • "data": {
            • "id": "6ea67361-8a5b-4631-a33a-764be0a91104",
            • "type": "project"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/events/a710a761-40bf-44d3-8f3f-d84689809671"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

Jobs

Endpoint to fetch information about the jobs processed by the OpsChain.

Get information about the jobs that are being processed by the OpsChain

Returns information about the jobs that are being processed by the OpsChain.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[status_eq]=finished

API filtering guide

limit
integer [ 1 .. 1000 ]
Default: 100
Example: limit=50

Limit the number of jobs returned

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/jobs

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "633996",
      • "type": "job",
      • "attributes": {
        • "priority": 32,
        • "job_class": "ChangeJob",
        • "error_count": 0,
        • "last_error_message": null,
        • "queue": "default",
        • "last_error_backtrace": null,
        • "args": "\"[]\"",
        • "data": "\"{}\"",
        • "kwargs": "\"{}\"",
        • "maximum_retry_count": 0,
        • "node_id": "6bce1b7f-7431-40ab-bf5b-d635a39911dc",
        • "node_path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
        • "status": "finished",
        • "description": "Verifies if a change can be started based on its owner configuration and, if so, starts it.",
        • "run_at": "2025-09-10T17:13:31.277505Z",
        • "finished_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:48.988676Z",
        • "expired_at": null
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false,
    • "has_any": true,
    • "total_matching_filter": 1
    }
}

required
string

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "25230314-8432-421e-839c-197c28de1f27",
    • "type": "settings",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "requires_approval_from": "opschain",
        • "repo_folder": ".opschain"
        },
      • "version": 1,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:03.453012Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/settings/25230314-8432-421e-839c-197c28de1f27",
      • "current_version": "/api/settings/25230314-8432-421e-839c-197c28de1f27/versions/1",
      • "versions": "/api/settings/25230314-8432-421e-839c-197c28de1f27/versions"
      }
    }
}

Update settings

Updates a settings JSON if the included version matches the current settings version.

path Parameters
id_to_update
required
string
Example: 974afa03-2bc5-4c3f-9c1f-cefa4fe25b6e

settings id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/settings/{id_to_update}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "requires_approval_from": "opschain",
        • "repo_folder": ".opschain",
        • "notifications": {
          • "channels": [
            • {
              • "name": "slack-1",
              • "type": "slack",
              • "token": "slack-token"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "version": 1
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "1c24f923-6171-4cab-8174-2a5797363ea0",

        • "requires_approval_from": "opschain",
        • "repo_folder": ".opschain",
        • "notifications": {
          • "channels": [
            • {
              • "name": "slack-1",
              • "type": "slack",
              • "token": "{AES2}NF7AWEL/0uEHYO9d5AXXhA=={/IV}UlwElnwdHJ9ua+ora0PIJUg=="
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "version": 2,
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:03.752865Z"
      },

        • "data": {
          • "requires_approval_from": "opschain",
          • "repo_folder": ".opschain"

        • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:46:04.786798Z"

        • "versions": "/api/settings/2c2af879-6a28-4fbb-b55b-e6032309ef47/versions",

      }
    ]

Create rule

Create an authorisation rule.

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_rules

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "path": "^/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
      • "readable": false,
      • "updatable": false,
      • "executable": false,
      • "name": "Deny access to Project asset"
      }
    }
}

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "5ed1082b-9ee4-446c-87ad-cf1adaad0080",
    • "type": "authorisation_rule",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "calculate",
      • "path": "^/projects/wmqmb/environments/ihisc",
      • "readable": false,
      • "updatable": false,
      • "executable": false,
      • "created_by": "ettie.miller",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:26.276573Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:26.276573Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "authorisation_policies": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/authorisation_rules/5ed1082b-9ee4-446c-87ad-cf1adaad0080"
      }
    }
}

path Parameters

required
string

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "6d444bdb-cdf8-47ce-adbe-d459eea162ca",
    • "type": "authorisation_rule",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Deny access to Project asset",
      • "path": "^/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
      • "readable": false,
      • "updatable": false,
      • "executable": false,
      • "created_by": "opschain",
      • "created_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:26.825758Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:26.825758Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "authorisation_policies": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "d2080d65-6087-41dd-bed3-75865dc4dec0",
            • "type": "authorisation_policy"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/authorisation_rules/6d444bdb-cdf8-47ce-adbe-d459eea162ca"
      }
    }
}

path Parameters

required
string

required
object

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "path": "/projects/demo/environments/dev",
      • "readable": false,
      • "updatable": false,
      • "executable": false,
      • "name": "Deny all on dev environment"
      }
    }

  • 404

      • "name": "Deny all on dev environment",
      • "path": "^/projects/demo/environments/dev",

      • "updated_at": "2025-09-11T00:45:27.526121Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "authorisation_policies": {
        • "data": [

Authorisation policies

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[name_eq]=secure

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "4573f183-4d54-4193-8845-498c320f4695",

      • "attributes": {
        • "name": "Sample policy",
        • "description": null,
        • "system": false,
        • "created_by": "test",
